quote: It reminds me that no embrace will ever feel the same again, because no one will ever be like her again, because she's gone. She's gone, and crying feels so useless, so stupid, but it's all I can do.
quote_letters: IT REMINDS ME THAT NO EMBRACE WILL EVER FEEL THE SAME AGAIN BECAUSE NO ONE WILL EVER BE LIKE HER AGAIN BECAUSE SHES GONE SHES GONE AND CRYING FEELS SO USELESS SO STUPID BUT ITS ALL I CAN DO
